name: Love or Money
description:
Funny game with love stories, extremely brain-damaging life. Help increase logical thinking, quick reflexes, memory and peak analysis ability.

Outstanding feature "Love or Money"
- The game is different, attractive, surely you will not be experienced anywhere
- How to play simple plus fun music
- The content of the story has a deep but full of humor

You will laugh continuously, combining analytical thinking ability to judge the end of the story. Giving a whole new experience to see if you can overcome or not?

Enjoy it
